                  LCD_Index2Color_M565 PROC
;;;48     */
;;;49     LCD_COLOR LCD_Index2Color_M565(int Index) {
000000  b430              PUSH     {r4,r5}
;;;50       unsigned int r,g,b;
;;;51       /* Seperate the color masks */
;;;52       b = Index                                  & B_MASK;
000002  f000021f          AND      r2,r0,#0x1f
;;;53       g = (Index >> B_BITS)                      & G_MASK;
000006  f3c01145          UBFX     r1,r0,#5,#6
;;;54       r = ((unsigned)Index >> (B_BITS + G_BITS)) & R_MASK;
00000a  f3c020c4          UBFX     r0,r0,#11,#5
;;;55       /* Convert the color masks */
;;;56       r = r * 255 / R_MASK;
00000e  f8dfc03c          LDR      r12,|L1.76|
000012  ebc02400          RSB      r4,r0,r0,LSL #8
000016  4663              MOV      r3,r12
000018  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00001a  fbe4300c          UMLAL    r3,r0,r4,r12
00001e  08c3              LSRS     r3,r0,#3
;;;57       g = g * 255 / G_MASK;
000020  4d0b              LDR      r5,|L1.80|
000022  ebc12401          RSB      r4,r1,r1,LSL #8
000026  4629              MOV      r1,r5
000028  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00002a  fbe41005          UMLAL    r1,r0,r4,r5
00002e  0901              LSRS     r1,r0,#4
;;;58       b = b * 255 / B_MASK;
000030  ebc22402          RSB      r4,r2,r2,LSL #8
000034  4662              MOV      r2,r12
000036  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000038  fbe4200c          UMLAL    r2,r0,r4,r12
00003c  08c0              LSRS     r0,r0,#3
;;;59       return r + (g<<8) + (((U32)b)<<16);
00003e  eb032101          ADD      r1,r3,r1,LSL #8
;;;60     }
000042  bc30              POP      {r4,r5}
000044  eb014000          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #16      ;59
000048  4770              BX       lr
;;;61     
                          ENDP

00004a  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.76|
                          DCD      0x42108421
                  |L1.80|
                          DCD      0x41041041
